title: 【軍事台】美國正研發冷戰後首款新型熱核彈頭W93

replies.msg:
https://torontosun.com/news/world/new-u-s-nuclear-warhead



It’s just a bullet-point in a press release, but it could have a significant impact in the geopolitical landscape.

This year’s presidential budget ask from the National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) — the U.S. federal agency charged with the maintenance of America’s nuclear arsenal — makes mention of a new thermonuclear warhead development program, the first since the end of the Cold War.

“The W93 warhead program was recently endorsed by the Nuclear Weapons Council and the deputy secretary of defense to support the U.S. Strategic Command-required replacement for the Navy’s Trident II D5 submarine launched ballistic missile (SLBM)” reads the second bullet-point in a list of highlights from the $15.6-billion Weapons Activities’ budget request.

The line-item also mentions funding for four other nuclear modernization programs — life-extensions for the B61-12 gravity bomb and W80-4 cruise missile warhead, W88 ballistic missile warhead alterations and a modification program for the W87 warhead.

Developing a brand-new nuclear warhead — something the U.S. hasn’t done since the W88 in the late 1980s — came as a surprise to those in defence and global security circles.

“There’s a little lack of clarity on where the W93 came from,” said Ankit Panda, adjunct senior fellow in the Defense Posture Project at the Federation of American Scientists.
======
新彈頭名字叫W93，係1980年代末研發W88彈頭後首款新核彈頭
當量同詳細資料未知
測試方式未知，因為美國已經近30年冇進行過核試，發展新彈頭有機會重啟核試
小支支幾時武統台灣，想睇戲了
Mr. President. Please nuke China. 🇺🇲🇺🇲🇺🇲
佢話用黎裝響潛艇上面，咁推斷應該係戰略級別
